name: SouthernCaliforniaEdison
0:
”Alexa, ask Southern California Edison how can I change my mailing address?”
”Alexa, ask Southern California Edison why I'm having issues logging into My Account?”
”Alexa, ask Southern California Edison how do I view my alerts?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: southern california edison
des:
You can ask Southern California Edison general "frequently asked questions", like where best to find information such as billing & payment information, or who to contact if a tree is touching a wire. 
Currently, this skill can answer questions about the following categories:
- My Account
- Payment & Billing
- Contact Us/Support
- Rates
- Electric Vehicles (EV’s) 
- Tips

More categories, questions, and features will be added periodically. 

Please note that this skill cannot access information about outages or your SCE account.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
